movie.title: Marie Antoinette
movie.plot: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

events.title: Joe Louis and Max Schmeling fight for 12 rounds in the boxing ring

movie.title: Joe and Max
movie.plot: True story of boxers Joe Louis and Max Schmeling and their enduring friendship.

events.title: the Le Mans race ends, 24 hours after it began

movie.title: Ford v Ferrari
movie.plot: American car designer Carroll Shelby and the British-born driver Ken Miles work together to battle corporate interference, the laws of physics, and their own personal demons to build a revolutionary race car for Ford Motor Company and take on the dominating race cars of Enzo Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in France in 1966.
